pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Used as the base item for the Sclash Driver system

Obtained by using $(l:build/items/full_bottle)Empty Bottles$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/fullbottle_solidifier)Fullbottle Solidifier$(/l)$(br2)Drops from:$(li)$(l:build/mobs/grease)Kamen Rider Grease$(/l)
